messages.content: A bike that is a hybrid, can handle at the very least 30 miles on a charge, one that I can trust to be consistent
Thanks for sharing all those great preferences! To help you best, could you please tell me which one or two features are most important to you?
Not having a jerk on off feel and has predictable pace

Updated preferences: Not having a jerk on off feel  
Has predictable pace
Updated preferences to 2 points.

Selected item for recommendation: Tacx Flux 2 Smart Trainer Black, One Size (ID: B07FYHPQLQ)

Comparison aspects found: 
1. Product type: indoor smart bike trainer vs electric mountain bike  
2. Power source: manual pedal resistance unit vs electric motor and battery  
3. Resistance system: mechanical flywheel and axle adapters vs motor torque sensor and pedal assist  
4. Connectivity: Bluetooth and ANT+ for training apps vs app control and LCD display for speed and battery info  
5. Usage environment: stationary training indoors vs outdoor riding on varied terrain

I recommend the Tacx Flux 2 Smart Trainer because its heavier flywheel and higher mass inertia provide a very smooth, jerk-free pedal stroke and a predictable resistance curve, matching your preferences for no jerky on/off feel and consistent pacing.

Answer  
The user is asking about a feature related to the previous recommendation, specifically about the range exceeding 60 miles, which warrants a direct answer.

Currently, electric bikes with reliable support for 60+ miles per charge and excellent performance on all surfaces (gravel, sand, road) are rare but becoming available. Most fat-tire, full-suspension e-bikes with large batteries reach up to about 60 miles. To exceed 60 miles consistently while handling varied terrain, look for bikes with high-capacity battery packs (typically 48V 15Ah or larger) combined with efficient motors (around 750W) and multiple assist modes to optimize battery usage.

No widely available e-bike currently offers significantly more than 60 miles per charge on mixed surfaces without recharging, but some models may push close to or slightly beyond that under ideal conditions.

Great! You've selected **Electric Bike Adult 500W/350W Electric Bicycle 25MPH 65Miles 26" City Ebike for Men,Mountain Electric Bike48V 12AH Removable Larger Battery, Professional 6 Speed Gears with Charger and Lock**. Are you sure you want to go with this recommendation?
Yes, I want this one.

Great! It has a big battery so I don't need to charge every night, it is capable of city rides and as a mountain bike it should work as an all rounder
